description: If there’s something specific you want to flip then you just have to write it with upside down words. Then, whoever you send these flipped words to has to flip their screen so they can read the word. Talk about taking it off the page. Go ahead and flip some words.  (╯°□°)╯︵ ʞooqǝɔɐℲ (╯°□°)╯︵ ɹǝʇʇıʍ⊥ (∿°○°)∿ ︵ ǝʌol (╯°□°)╯︵ ∀ԀIԀ ∀ԀOS (╯°□°)╯︵ ɯsıɥdɹoɯouǝʞs (╯°□°)╯︵ sɯɐxǝ (╯°□°)╯︵ ƃuıʎpnʇs (╯°□°)╯︵ ʞɹoʍ ∀ԀOS ∀ԀIԀ ︵╰(°□°)╯︵ ∀ԀIԀ ∀ԀOS
title: Flipping Words
